option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
listen for fitted data on the local port number lport (default is 44102).
connect to the error logger at hostname or IP address ehost (default is localhost).
connect to the error logger at port number eport (default is 44000).
append an optional channel identifier chn to the output filename.

synopsis.p: Stores fitted data in fitacf files.
